item.title: DMR Adventures: Taking the DMR Plunge
item.description: Having a number of analogue VHF/UHF radios, and spending most/all of my time on HF, I really didn’t see the need to branch into digital VHF/UHF. A few things fueled my curiosity this past Spring: HF SSB voice was not fun. I run QRP+ by choice, like low power energy portable, and I get tired of competing with foot stomping linear activating massive beam stations to just hear one side of a conversation.
